

name: Mia Dependency Analyzer
description:
  Analyzes all project dependencies, fetches up-to-date and version-specific documentation and recommended usage patterns from Context7, compares against current project usage, and applies recommended improvements automatically.

# Mia Dependency Analyzer Agent

Analyze all project dependencies. For each dependency, use Context7 to fetch the most up-to-date and version-specific documentation and recommended usage patterns. Compare the projectâ€™s usage against the official docs and apply any recommended fixes or improvements automatically.
